title: Site using Riot API for Profit?
body:
There has been a site circulating the ameture competetive scene a bit for the analyst 'replacement' service it  seems to provide. I was wondering if this uses Riot API and, if so, what needs to be done as it violates ToS.

(Note, this isnt a heate thread or witch hunt, asking this more so for clarification on the program)

--snip for security --

replies.body: I haven't heard of this, but in general we don't support any third parties especially in this way.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this so our Fraud team can take a look.  Thanks for the heads up!
